title: League of Legends "Board famous" posters;
body:
AKALI IS SO HOT
Malicious Metal
Deep Terror Nami
....?

I would like to be among these names someday, but today is not that day (yet). I am approaching the singularity though..... very soon... I notice that every one of these so far is directly associated with an in-game champ. I should have named this account Dominick Evelynn, sigh.

I don't venture to this side of the boards very often, it feels strange.
